plot outline: Eeta is a Malayalam film by I. V. Sasi starring Kamal Haasan, Madhu, Sheela and Seema. It is a triangular love story where Sheela and Seema fall in love with Kamal Haasan. M. G. Soman played the cunning villain Gopalan. Watch the full movie Yeetta online, only on Eros Now.
title: Eeta
plot: Ramu's father is a well-respected man who works for Gopalan, unaware that his employer is a smuggler. However, a bitter rivalry ensues when Gopalan is exposed, leading to a huge calamity.

_Eeta_ (qv) is a Malayalam film by I. V. Sasi starring Kamal Haasan, Madhu, Sheela and Seema. It is a triangular love story where Sheela and Seema fall in love with Kamal Haasan. M. G. Soman played the cunning villain Gopalan. Watch the full movie Yeetta online, only on Eros Now.
